title: My Family
text: I have a big family. My father's name is John. He is 45 years old. He is a doctor. My mother's name is Mary. She is 42. She is a teacher. I have one brother and one sister. My brother is 15. His name is Mike. My sister is 10. Her name is Anna. We have a cat. Its name is Whiskers. We live in a house with a garden. I love my family very much!

questions.question: The family lives in a ___ with a garden.
